name: Add more files extensions
author: Arthur Lacoste

sections.description:
Add more files extensions with a new field in your Medias Settings.

You can check the dev page

You just need to insert your extensions in Settings > Medias > Uploading Files separate by a space (ex : ‘exe pdf rar’), and the plugin does the rest.

This plugin is in french but the translation in english is in progress.
sections.installation:
1. You can use automatic installer, or
  2. Upload add-more-files-extensions folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Go to Medias Settings in your control panel
sections.faq:
What I need to insert in the ‘extensions’ field ?

You just need to insert your extensions separate by a space (ex : ‘exe pdf rar’), and the plugin does the rest.

Where can I donate ?

This is not available fo the moment.

  • Change readme.txt for WordPress.org plugin browser
